prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with bright red wings and a cheerful expression.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a small insect with blue eyes and a playful demeanor.
Generate a flying Pokemon that has a mix of red and yellow colors and can be found in forests.

Design a vibrant bug-type Pokemon with distinctive features like large wings and a happy face.
